LanguageData.Estate_EmptyFuelContentsNoFuel: There is no fuel to discharge.
LanguageData.Estate_EmptyFuelContentsDesc: Discharges a variable percentage of fuel items (as coal). This will often stop boiler overload.\n\nWARNING: Fuel items will still be on fire if the boiler is active.
LanguageData.Estate_BlowSteamWhistleDesc: This whistle will sound automatically if pressure reaches overload. Manually blowing the steam whistle will create a shrill sound, but not much else.
LanguageData.Estate_SetTargetFuelLevel: Set target fuel level to {0}\nPressure level will be {1}
LanguageData.Estate_WaterPlaceWorker_NeedSource: Must place next to a water source.
LanguageData.Estate_WaterPlaceWorker_TwoPumps: Must not be in range of other pumps.
LanguageData.Estate_VentToxicGasWarnDesc: WARNING: Also vents {0} of toxic gas.
LanguageData.Estate_ToxicGasConnectedRateStored: Toxic gas rate/stored: {0} Psi per day / {1} Psi
LanguageData.Estate_SteamConnectedRateStored: Steam rate/stored: {0} Psi per day / {1} Psi
LanguageData.Estate_WaterConnectedRateStored: Water rate/stored: {0} Liters per day / {1} Liters
LanguageData.Estate_MustPlaceOnCoalVein: Must be placed on a coal vein.
LanguageData.Estate_MustPlaceOnCopperVein: Must be placed on a copper vein.
LanguageData.Estate_XSlotsForBooks: Can hold a total of {0} books
LanguageData.Estate_RetrieveBookDesc: Find and remove a particular book from the bookcase.
